name: Plumage Doomage
description:
Pigeons! Pigeons everywhere! This is a side-scrolling beat-em-up implemented with hordes of pigeons. Your health , and energy, all as one, PIGEON bar!

This was a game made during the 2019 Carnegie Mellon University National High School Game Academy by team 28. It's been a long time and I do not currently keep contact with my team members so I apologize for not being able to credit them properly.

Note that we did not make a proper pause menu and so just alt + f4 if you want to leave when you are in game.
